column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Came on a Monday night and it was busy! Even an hour and a half close to closing. Sat at the bar. The bartender/server was super busy but attentive! She was wonderful! Food came out fairly quickly! Got the shrimp wonton ramen. Added some "hot sauce" and some "seasoning" but overall
column2: really tasty! Had to take some to-go
